name: Historic Chateau in the Vendee
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Château offers you the possibility of renting its domain to celebrate your wedding day in the heart of a historic castle.
It is within the walls of the castle that we offer you the rental of a 200 m² room to accommodate up to 200 guests! Floor-to-ceiling windows provide natural light and we provide you with many lights according to the atmosphere you want. The exposed stones and the cathedral ceiling give this place an exceptional appeal to celebrate all your family celebrations. This inclusive space has been designed to be accessible to people with reduced mobility.
With its origins in the 15th and 16th centuries, its entrance porch, which is the most majestic in the Vendée, is listed as a Historic Monument. The gardens are spread over 10,000 m² inside and around the Château.
For your reception, the stable room can accommodate up to 200 people depending on your wish for space planning.
2022 season
The team are busy renovating cottages at the chateau to provide many more guest bedrooms - if you are booking for 2022 onwards, please ask for further details.
Historic charm in a green setting: the chateau's entrance porch, listed as a Historic Monument , will welcome your guests for all your family celebrations .
The estate has a park with an area of 10,000 m². Within this space you will find:
A French-style garden , ideal for a reception or an outdoor banquet
A secure heated swimming pool 10 meters long
A large aisle leading directly to the reception hall
A remarkable century-old chestnut tree for your summer photoshoots
A wooded park allowing guests to park
The reception hall
Do you like atypical photos ? A mezzanine will allow you to take pictures from an original angle.
Technical spaces:
90 m² are here at your disposal including:
Professional kitchen
A cozy space
Refurbished sanitary facilities also accessible to people with reduced mobility
Technical areas such as the reception hall are secure and have emergency exits.
Our cottages are under construction but we can recommend charming hotels nearby. However, tents and motorhomes are allowed on the grounds of the castle.
For the organizers or for example, the bride and groom, we provide a comfortably furnished guest room in one of the towers of the castle.
The base price for 3000 euros includes private hire of the reception hall for three days. Please enquire for more details.
additional_info:
